entry.title: Roadtrip in America 2013
entry.content:
In this year, I did several crazy road trips, each trip has about 3k miles. Here’re them.

Winter Trip

The first trip is a trip with my parents, where they flied to Chicago and I drove them to UIUC for a visit. We then flied to LA and rented a car to start our road trip. The whole trip was mainly in California, though we drove a bit east and visited Las Vegas and Grand canyon.

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-3XKmLgVuYw8/UlBRR-rXocI/AAAAAAAA6Qg/IIHynx2WdOQ/s800/Winter%2520trip.png">

Route 66

I drove from Champaign all the way to Mountain View, with most of the part of Route 66.

https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-fMUI4Zi2a68/UlBUCwGlIoI/AAAAAAAA6Q0/14KGATd9IHw/s800/Champaign%252C%2520IL%2520to%2520Mountain%2520View%252C%2520CA%2520-%2520Google%2520Maps.png">

I-80

After my internship in California, I drove back from Mountain View to Champaign.
